entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
